subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Patrik Elias, the Devils’ captain, gave the 19,040 fans something to roar about early, helping the Devils score on their first shot en route to a victory.
snippet: Patrik Elias, the Devils’ captain, gave the 19,040 fans something to roar about early, helping the Devils score on their first shot en route to a victory.
